metadata.title: CVE-2024-57921 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Add a lock when accessing the buddy trim functionWhen running YouTube videos and Steam games simultaneously,the tester found a system hang / race condition issue withthe multi-display configuration setting. Adding a lock tothe buddy allocator's trim function would be the solution.<log snip>[ 7197.250436] general protection fault, probably for non-canonical address0xdead000000000108[ 7197.250447] RIP: 0010:__alloc_range+0x8b/0x340 [amddrm_buddy][ 7197.250470] Call Trace:[ 7197.250472]  <TASK>[ 7197.250475]  ?
